channel.title: Need help with premium cant get it to work
channel.description: When I go into Client.java search for prem i set the default to true and it gives everyone premium status. But I dont want to give everyone premium status, I just want to give the person that payed for it premium. I didnt everything I can think of...If ANYONE has any idea to atleast give me a little help on this I would gladely appreeciate it!

lol, because mines set at 1, it needs to be changed to 2 for prmeium
